contextId.information: Paul uses this question to encourage the believers and answers it in the next verse. This rhetorical question can be positively stated. AT: "You are our confidence for the future, our joy, and our crown of glory when our Lord Jesus Christ comes" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
contextId.quote: For what is our confidence ... at his coming?

contextId.information: This rhetorical question can be expressed as a statement. AT: "We cannot thank God enough for what he has done for you! We greatly rejoice over you when we pray to our God!" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
contextId.quote: For what thanks can we give to God for you, for all the joy that we have before our God over you?
